snippet.title: Arcas Champions - Official Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Arcas Champions is a fast-paced, third-person arcade shooter game with fun and intense combat with endless customization. Unlock Champion Cards, upgrade stats, and fine-tune your loadout. Combine Super Totems to unleash powerful abilities, and dominate the battlefield!

Arcas Champions Beta launches December 4th, 2024 for PC on Steam and Epic Games. 

 Wishlist and sign up for beta access:

🎮 STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3211990/Arcas_Champions/

🎮 Epic Games: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/apeshootergame_alphatest-0e0d26

For more info:
🔗 Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/arcas
🔗 Follow Arcas Champions on X: https://x.com/arcaschampions
